#suicideprevention is a Public Health issue 2/3 people who die by suicide are not in contact with #mentalhealth services & the majority are middle aged men
@samaritans talking about how to outreach to the general public; people need to know how to intervene #MWF2018 #WSPD2018

When you bump in to your previous Chairman when you’re rushing down Whitehall... a quick hug and “sorry @peterjmolyneux I’ve gotta dash, I’m off to a meeting at the House of Lords”
Great to see you Boss... coffee next time 😊
#WSPD2018 #ADayintheLife

Walking through rush hour in London on #WorldSuicidePreventioDay
#mentalhealth is invisible, so it’s not easy or obvious to spot the 1:4 of us suffering

Procrastinating again? Some great #toptips in this article 👇🏻
✅ How can I do this in a way that works for me?
✅ Break the task down into three pieces so it seems more manageable
✅ Plan to do something that feels rewarding to you several times a day
